text: Jaakko Ilari Jonkka (12 February 1953 â€“ 4 January 2022) was a Finnish politician and lawyer. He was the Chancellor of Justice of Finland from 2007 to 2017. Jonkka was born in Lavia, Finland. Jonkka died on 4 January 2022 in Helsinki, Finland at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Finnish politicians Category:Finnish lawyers
title: Jaakko Jonkka
